I am a first year masters student in the biostatistics department at Columbia University. I am also a tutor and tutor math for grades 3-12 as well as Spanish. I enjoy photography, playing violin in the New Westchester Symphony Orchestra, and playing tennis. Here is a linked to my [resume](alinalevine_cv.html)
